abilityEffect: As long as Abomasnow is your Active Pokémon, any damage done to your Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

effect.en: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon, excluding [G] Pokémon and [W] Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
If Abomasnow evolved from Snover during this turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
